I went to a movie with my cousin and then out for dinner. We went to this place that had... Ooh... (she looks likes she is in pain, holding her belly) Hoo... ooh... Anyway, they had these really amazing cheeseburgers.ScenesMonica: Erica, are you okay?ScenesErica: Yeah, you know, maybe I ate too much. I keep getting these stomach aches. They come and go like every few minutes.ScenesMonica: Oh my God!ScenesChandler: Relax! We just get her some antacids.ScenesMonica: She doesn't have a stomach ache, she's in labor.ScenesChandler: Oh my God!ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, you got to get to the hospital.ScenesMonica: All right, Chandler get the coats. Erica let's go. Phoebe and Joey, keep packing! Oh my God we're gonna have a baby. All right. We're gonna have a baby! OH MY GOD, WE'RE GONNA HAVE A BABY! Oh God, oh God, I got to sit down, I got to sit down. Ooh! (she's hyperventilating)ScenesChandler: Honey, it's gonna be okay.ScenesErica: You can do this. Just breathe.ScenesMonica: Okay, okay... Okay, I feel a little better.ScenesErica: (in pain) Ooh! Are you sure?ScenesMonica: Oh... Yes, I'm sure. Oh honey, let's go. Okay bye everyone.Scenes(there's a lot of supportive cheers from all. Erica, Monica and Chandler leave.)ScenesJoey: Chandler, wait, wait, wait...ScenesChandler: What?ScenesJoey: If you get a second, find out where she got that cheeseburger.Scenes

rows.Scenes: Ross's apartment. Rachel bursts in.]
rows.Content: Rachel: You really think I didn't say goodbye to you because I don't care?ScenesRoss: That's what it seemed like.ScenesRachel: I cannot believe that after ten years, you do not know ONE thing about me.ScenesRoss: Fine, then why didn't you say something?ScenesRachel: Because it is too damn hard Ross. I can't even begin to explain to you how much I'm gonna miss you. When I think about not seeing you every day, it makes me not want to go... Okay, so if you think that I didn't say goodbye to you because you don't mean as much to me as everybody else, you're wrong. It's because you mean more to me. So there, all right, there's your goodbye... Oh!ScenesRoss: Rach!ScenesRachel: What?ScenesRoss: You keep, you keep... You can't...ScenesRachel: WHAT?Scenes(Ross walks over to her and starts to kiss her passionately. After a while Rachel backs out. She thinks a while and starts kissing him back.)Scenes ScenesCOMMERCIAL BREAK

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Monica's apartment.]
rows.Content: Joey: A little more.ScenesPhoebe: Okay. (she starts to stuff styrofoam peanuts down the front of Joey's pants.)ScenesJoey: A little more, a little more. (she stuffs some more down his pants and Joey's assesses the how many there already are in there.) A little more... All right. Okay, all right, let's do this.ScenesPhoebe: All right, ready?ScenesJoey: Yeah. All right, now give me your best shot.ScenesPhoebe: All right, here it goes...Scenes(she knees him in the crotch. He jumps up a bit)ScenesJoey: (in pain) Doesn't work... (he falls down on on his knees with his head on the floor)ScenesTHE ENDScenesFriends Scenes1017-1018 - The Last OneScenesWritten by: Marta Kauffman & David CraneScenesDirected by: Kevin BrightScenesTranscribed by: Kreidy

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's apartment. It's a scene from 1016 TOW Rachel's Going Away Party.]
rows.Content: Jennifer Aniston (V.O.): Previously on Friends.ScenesMonica: Erica, are you okay?ScenesErica: Yeah, you know, maybe I ate too much. I keep getting these stomach-aches. They come and go like every few minutes.ScenesMonica: Oh my God!ScenesChandler: Relax! We'll just get her some antacids.ScenesMonica: She doesn't have a stomach-ache. She's in labor!ScenesChandler: Oh my God!Scenes Scenes[Cut to Ross's apartment. Ross and Rachel are there. It's another scene from 1016 TOW Rachel's Going Away Party.]ScenesRachel: So if you think I didn't say goodbye to you because you don't mean as much to me as everybody else, you're wrong. It's because you mean more to me.ScenesRoss: Rach!ScenesRachel: What?!Scenes(He walks over and kisses her. They pull back, Rachel looks at him, and they kiss again.)Scenes

rows.Scenes: Ross's bedroom. Rachel is putting on her shoes as Ross shows up from underneath the covers.]
rows.Content: Ross: Hey.ScenesRachel: Shh.. Go back to sleep. I have to go home.ScenesRoss: Oh. This was amazing.ScenesRachel: It really was. You've learned some new moves!ScenesRoss: Yeah, well, this guy at work gave me "Sex for Dummies" as a joke.ScenesRachel: Ah.ScenesRoss: Who's laughing now?ScenesRachel: I know!Scenes(They kiss.)Scenes ScenesOPENING CREDITS

rows.Scenes: The delivery room at the hospital. Monica, Chandler and Erica are there. Erica is in labor, and she is breathing heavily.]
rows.Content: Monica: Breathe, breathe, breathe... Good.ScenesChandler: Next time, can I say breathe?ScenesMonica: No, last time you said it like Dracula, and it scared her! Can I get you anything? You want some more ice chips?ScenesErica: No, I'm okay.ScenesMonica: Alright, I'll be right back.ScenesChandler: Where are you going?ScenesMonica: To use the bathroom.ScenesChandler: You can't leave me alone with her.ScenesMonica: What?ScenesChandler: This is exactly the kind of social situation that I am not comfortable with!ScenesMonica: What kind of social situation are you comfortable with?ScenesChandler: It's just that we've never spent any time, you know, alone together.ScenesMonica: You'll be fine. Nah, you won't, but I'll be back in two minutes.ScenesChandler: Okay.Scenes(Monica leaves, and Chandler closes the door. Erica just looks at him.)ScenesChandler: So, ah... Any plans for the summer?ScenesErica: I don't know. Maybe church-camp?ScenesChandler: Hah. May not wanna mention this. So, you ever wonder which is worse, you know; going through labor or getting kicked in the nuts?ScenesErica: What?ScenesChandler: Well, it's just interesting. You know, because no one will ever know, because no one can experience both.Scenes(Erica just looks at him like he's crazy.)ScenesChandler: One of life's great, unanswerable questions. I mean, who knows? Maybe there's something even more painful than those things? Like this.Scenes

rows.Scenes: Joey and Rachel's apartment. Joey is there as Phoebe enters. Joey is holding a baby duck.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Morning.ScenesJoey: Hey!ScenesPhoebe: What's that?ScenesJoey: It's my house-warming present for Monica and Chandler.ScenesPhoebe: It's a baby chick and duck!ScenesJoey: Uh-huh. And I named them Chick Jr. and Duck Jr.ScenesPhoebe: I did not see that coming.ScenesJoey: Yeah, I figure they'll love it at the new house, you know? It has that big backyard. And then, when they get old, they can go to that special farm that Chandler took the other chick and duck to.ScenesPhoebe: Yes.ScenesJoey: Yeah. It's a shame people can't visit there.ScenesPhoebe: That is the rule, though.Scenes(Ross enters.)ScenesPhoebe: Guess what? You're almost an uncle!ScenesRoss: What?ScenesJoey: Yeah, Erica went into labor last night. Monica and Chandler are at the hospital right now!ScenesRoss: Oh my God!ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, and I have a definite feeling it's gonna be a girl.ScenesRoss: Phoebe, you were sure Ben was gonna be a girl.ScenesPhoebe: Have you seen him throw a ball?ScenesRoss: Is Rachel here?ScenesJoey: Uh, I think she's still asleep. Hey, hey, how did it go with you guys last night? She seemed pretty pissed at you.ScenesRoss: Uh, we, y'know, we worked things out.ScenesPhoebe: What's that smile? Did something happen with you two?ScenesRoss: Hey, I'm not one to kiss and tell, but I'm also not one to have sex and shut up. We totally did it!ScenesJoey: Oh my God. You and Rachel?ScenesRoss: I know, it's pretty great.ScenesJoey: So what does that mean? Are you guys getting back together?ScenesRoss: Oh, I.. I don't know. We didn't really get to talk.ScenesPhoebe: But do you wanna get back together?ScenesRoss: I don't know. It was incredible. I mean, it just felt so right. When I was holding her, I mean, I never wanted to let her go. You know what? Yeah, I do. I wanna be together.ScenesPhoebe: (screaming) YAY!ScenesRoss: Shhh!ScenesPhoebe: (quietly) Yay!ScenesJoey: So, so is she still going to Paris?ScenesRoss: Wow, I hadn't thought of that. I hope not.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, this is like the best day ever. Ever! You guys might get back together, Monica and Chandler are getting their baby, there are chicks and ducks in the world again! Oh, I feel like I'm in a musical! (Singing) "Daa - raa... When the sun comes up, bright and beaming! And the moon comes...Scenes(Rachel enters from her room.)ScenesRachel: Morning!ScenesPhoebe: Guess we'll never know how it ends.ScenesJoey: Okay.ScenesRoss: Hey.ScenesRachel: Hey.ScenesRoss: Hey. How did you sleep?ScenesRachel: Good. You?ScenesRoss: Good.ScenesJoey: I bet you did!ScenesRoss: Uh. Would you guys mind giving us a minute?ScenesJoey: Sure, yeah. Will you just keep an eye on the chick and the duck?ScenesRachel: Chick and the duck? Didn't they die...ScenesPhoebe: (interrupting) Dive. Yeah, they dove head-first into fun on the farm.Scenes(Joey and Phoebe leave.)ScenesRoss: So...Scenes(He kisses her.)ScenesRoss: Morning.ScenesRachel: You too. Last night was just wonderful.ScenesRoss: It really was.ScenesRachel: I woke up today with the biggest smile on my face.ScenesRoss: I know, me too. It was... You know, it was like one of those things you think is never gonna happen, and then it does, and it's everything you want it to be.ScenesRachel: Uh-huh. I know. It was just, it was just the perfect way to say goodbye. (She hugs him, and Ross looks crushed.)Scenes

rows.Scenes: The Hospital. Erica is moaning and about to give birth. Monica, Chandler, a nurse and a doctor are there with her.]
rows.Content: Monica: It's just a little bit more, honey.ScenesErica: Help me! This hurts!ScenesChandler: Is it really that bad?ScenesErica: Uh-huh! I think it's time to kick you in the nuts and see which is worse!Scenes(Monica gives Chandler a look.)ScenesDoctor: The baby's head is crowning.Scenes(Monica walks down to Erica's legs to watch the birth.)ScenesMonica: Oh! Oh my God! That is the most beautiful top of a head I have ever seen! Chandler, you have to see this!Scenes(Chandler is standing by Erica's head.)ScenesChandler: I'm okay.ScenesMonica: Chandler, you don't wanna miss this. This is the birth of your child! It's the miracle of life!ScenesChandler: Alright. Wow, that is one disgusting miracle.ScenesDoctor: Start pushing. Here we go. Here come the shoulders...Scenes(The baby starts crying, and the doctor holds it up.)ScenesMonica: It's a... It's a boy!ScenesChandler: Wow!ScenesErica: Is he okay?ScenesDoctor: He's just fine.ScenesMonica: Oh, you did it!ScenesChandler: (emotional) It's a baby! A beautiful little baby! And some other stuff I'm gonna pretend I don't see.ScenesDoctor: Would you like to cut the umbilical cord?Scenes(A nurse gives Monica a pair of scissors. Monica gives it to Chandler, and they cut it together.)ScenesChandler: Well, that's spongy.ScenesMonica: (to her son) Oh, hey handsome! Oh, I'm gonna love you so much that no woman is ever gonna be good enough for you! (To Chandler, on the verge of tears) Oh, we are so lucky!ScenesChandler: I know. He has your eyes.Scenes(Monica looks at him.)ScenesChandler: I mean, I know that's not possible, but he does.ScenesNurse: We'll just get him cleaned up a bit.Scenes(The doctor hands the boy to the nurse, and she walks over to another part of the room with him.)ScenesChandler: Okay.ScenesMonica: (To Erica) Oh my God, he's beautiful. Thank you so much.ScenesErica: I'm really happy for you guys.ScenesChandler: How do you feel?ScenesErica: I'm tired!ScenesDoctor: Well, you don't have that much time to relax. The other one will be along in a minute.Scenes(Chandler stares at the doctor, completely shocked. Monica just freezes and turns around slowly.)ScenesMonica: I... I'm sorry, who should be along in a what now?ScenesDoctor: The next baby should be along in a minute.ScenesMonica: We only ordered one!ScenesDoctor: You know it's twins, right?ScenesChandler: Oh, yeah! These are the faces of two people in the know!ScenesCOMMERCIAL BREAK

rows.Scenes: The hospital. Continued from earlier.]
rows.Content: Doctor: I can't believe you didn't know it's twins! This has never happened before.ScenesChandler: Well, gosh. That makes me feel so special and good.ScenesMonica: (to the doctor) Wait, did you know it was twins?ScenesDoctor: Yeah, it's here in the paperwork we got from the clinic in Ohio.ScenesMonica: (to Erica) Anybody tell you?ScenesErica: I don't think so. Although, they did mention something about two heartbeats. But I thought that was just mine and the baby's. They kept saying both heartbeats are really strong, and I thought well, that's good 'cause I'm having a baby.ScenesMonica: This is unbelievable.ScenesErica: Twins actually run in my family.ScenesChandler: Interesting! (To Monica) Can I see you for a second?Scenes(They walk over to the door.)ScenesChandler: What do we do?ScenesMonica: What do you mean "what do we do"?ScenesChandler: (panicking) Twins! Twins!!ScenesMonica: Chandler, you're panicking!ScenesChandler: Uh-huh! Join me, won't you?! Okay, what do you say we keep one, and then just like have an option on the other one?ScenesMonica: We can't split them up!ScenesChandler: Why not? We could give each of them half a medallion, and then years later, they'll find each other and be reunited. I mean, that's a great day for everybody.ScenesMonica: Okay, what if the person who adopts the other one is horrible?ScenesChandler: What if they're not? What if it's adopted by a king?ScenesMonica: Yeah, because I hear the king is looking to adopt.ScenesChandler: Monica, we are not ready to have two babies!ScenesMonica: That doesn't matter! We have waited so long for this. I don't care if it's two babies. I don't care if it's three babies! I don't care if the entire cast of "Eight is Enough" comes out of there! We are taking them home, because they are our children!ScenesChandler: (smiles) Okay. Shhh...Scenes(He hugs her.)ScenesChandler: Okay.ScenesMonica: Okay!ScenesChandler: Okay!ScenesDoctor: It looks like we're about ready over here.Scenes(Monica and Chandler run back to Erica's bed.)ScenesDoctor: Come on, Erica, start pushing again now.ScenesErica: Ow!Scenes(Erica screams.)ScenesDoctor: Here she comes!ScenesChandler: (shocked) She? It's a girl?ScenesDoctor: Yeah.ScenesChandler: (To Monica) Well, now we have one of each! (To the doctor) And that's enough!Scenes

rows.Scenes: Central Perk. Ross, Phoebe and Joey are there.]
rows.Content: Ross: And then she said it was the perfect way to say goodbye.ScenesJoey: Oh my God! What did you say?ScenesRoss: Nothing! What do you say to that?ScenesPhoebe: Ross, you've got to tell her how you feel!ScenesRoss: No way!ScenesJoey: You can't just give up! Is that what a dinosaur would do?ScenesRoss: What?ScenesJoey: Dude, I'm just trying to speak your language.ScenesPhoebe: Ross, Rachel doesn't know that you wanna get back together. If she did, she might feel differently. She might not even go.ScenesRoss: You really think so?ScenesPhoebe: I'm telling you! Oh, okay! This is the part of the musical where there'd be a really good convincing song. (Singing) "Bam-bam, don't take no for an answer. Bam-bam, don't let love fly away. Bam-bam-bam-bam...Scenes(Rachel enters and interrupts Phoebe's song.)ScenesRachel: Hi!ScenesPhoebe: Can't a girl finish a song around here?ScenesJoey: Hey!ScenesRachel: Hi! So I just dropped Emma off at my mom's.ScenesRoss: Okay.ScenesJoey: Oh, you're not taking her with you tonight?ScenesRachel: No, we decided that I would go ahead and set up first, and then my mom would bring Emma to Paris on Sunday.ScenesPhoebe: Wow, eight hour flight with a one-year old? Good luck, mom.ScenesRachel: Are you kidding? Eight hours with my mother talking about Atkins? Good luck, Emma!Scenes(Rachel walks up to the counter.)ScenesRoss: Alright, you know what? You're right. I should at least tell her how I feel.Scenes(He stands up.)ScenesJoey: Ross, wait!ScenesRoss: What? What?ScenesJoey: Could you get me a muffin?Scenes(Ross walks up to Rachel, but Gunther gets there first.)ScenesGunther: Rachel?ScenesRachel: Yeah?ScenesGunther: I... I know you're leaving tonight, but I just have to tell you. I love you.Scenes(Ross is shocked.)ScenesGunther: I... I don't know if that changes your plans at all, but I thought you should know.ScenesRachel: (touched) Gunther... Oh... I love you too. Probably not in the same way, but I do. And, and when I'm in a café, having coffee, or I see a man with hair brighter than the sun, I'll think of you. Aw.Scenes(She kisses him on the cheek and looks over at the others.)ScenesRachel: Oh... Bye guys.Scenes(Rachel leaves.)ScenesRoss: Oh my God!ScenesPhoebe: Unbelievable!ScenesJoey: Hey, you know what might help?ScenesRoss: I'm not getting you a muffin!Scenes

rows.Scenes: The hospital. Monica and Chandler are holding the twins, while two nurses are taking care of Erica.]
rows.Content: Monica: Do you think they recognize each other from in there?ScenesChandler: Maybe. Unless they're like two people who have lived in apartments next to each other for years, and then one day they're pushed through a vagina and they meet.ScenesNurse: We're going to take Erica to recovery now.ScenesMonica: There's something that we wanna tell you. We decided to name the girl-baby Erica.ScenesErica: Oh my God, that's just like my name!ScenesMonica: Son of a gun, it is!ScenesErica: Anyway, I'm gonna go and get some rest. I'm really glad I picked you guys. You're gonna make great parents. Even Chandler.ScenesMonica: Okay, well, bye!ScenesErica: Bye!ScenesChandler: Bye!ScenesMonica: We'll call you!ScenesErica: Okay.ScenesChandler: Have fun at church-camp!Scenes(The nurses take Erica to the recovery room. Monica and Chandler smile at each other.)ScenesMonica: Oh, look at these little bunnies!ScenesChandler: I know! You ready to trade?ScenesMonica: Okay.ScenesChandler: Okay.ScenesMonica: Alright, let's see..Scenes(They start trying to trade babies while holding one each. They have no idea how to do it, so they just shift the babies around in their arms. They give up pretty quickly.)ScenesChandler: We could trade later.ScenesMonica: Yeah, I'm good.Scenes

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's apartment. Joey and Phoebe are there. There is a white crib decorated with balloons in the middle of the apartment. Also, there are boxes all over the apartment. Joey is working on something on the coffee table.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Hey, what are you working on?ScenesJoey: It's a... It's a "welcome home" sign for the baby.Scenes(He holds up a white poster with huge red letters. It reads, "Welcome Home Baby." There is also a huge red stain on the left of the poster.)ScenesPhoebe: How sweet! Oh, is that the baby?Scenes(She points at the stain.)ScenesJoey: No, I sat in the paint.Scenes(Ross enters with a gift for the baby.)ScenesRoss: Hey.ScenesPhoebe: Hey. So, did you talk to Rachel?ScenesRoss: No, and I'm not going to.ScenesPhoebe: What?ScenesJoey: Why not?ScenesRoss: Because she's just going to shoot me down. You guys saw what happened with Gunther. That did not look like fun.ScenesPhoebe: How can you compare yourself to Gunther? I mean, sure, he's sexy in a more obvious way. You have a relationship with her, you slept together last night.ScenesRoss: Yeah, and she still wants to go! It's pretty clear where she is.ScenesJoey: Yeah, I know what you mean. I mean, sometimes...Scenes(He sits down in the wet paint again.)ScenesPhoebe: Uh, Joe?ScenesJoey: Damn it!ScenesRoss: Look, even if I were gonna tell her, I don't have to do it now. Okay? I'll be seeing her again. We've got time.ScenesPhoebe: No, you don't! She's going to Paris! She is going to meet somebody. Do you know how many hot guys there are in Paris? It's... It's a city of Gunthers!Scenes(Mike enters with a roll of paper in his hand.)ScenesMike: Hey!ScenesPhoebe: Hey! What do you have there?ScenesMike: Oh, I made a little something. If I had more time to work on it, it'd be better, but..Scenes(He shows them a beautiful banner he has made. It reads, "Welcome to the World, Baby Bing.")ScenesRoss: Oh my God! You did that yourself?ScenesPhoebe: Honey, that's gorgeous!ScenesJoey: You know, the baby can't read, Mike!Scenes(Rachel enters.)ScenesRachel: Hi! You guys, the car-service just got here. I can't believe they're not home yet! I have to catch my stupid plane. I wanna see the baby!ScenesJoey: Monica just called from the cab. She said they should be here any minute. And apparently, there's some big surprise.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, did she sound happy about it? 'Cause my friend Ethel's baby was born with a teeny, tiny beard.Scenes(Monica enters carrying her son.)ScenesRachel: Oh my God!ScenesRoss: Oh my God!Scenes(They all walk over to see the baby.)ScenesRachel: Hi! Oh my gosh!Scenes(Chandler enters carrying his daughter.)ScenesChandler: Hey.Scenes(Everybody turns around.)ScenesPhoebe, Ross, Rachel: Hey.Scenes(They turn back around to see the baby Monica's carrying, but then they realise what the surprise is. Ross, Mike, Phoebe and Rachel gasp and stare at Chandler and his baby. Joey hasn't figured it out yet.)ScenesJoey: (To Monica) Hey, so what is the big surprise?ScenesRachel: Oh.Scenes(Joey stares at Chandler and Monica and finally puts two and two together. He gasps.)ScenesRoss: Oh my God!ScenesRachel: What... What...ScenesRoss: Okay, okay, awkward question. The hospital knows you took two, right?ScenesMonica: Yes, it's twins!ScenesRoss: Oh my God.ScenesJoey: Oh, they're so cute! Now, what, what kinds are they?ScenesMonica: (points at the baby she's holding) This is a boy, (points at the baby Chandler is holding) and that's a girl.ScenesChandler: Her name is Erica.ScenesRachel: Aw..ScenesJoey: Hey, that pregnant girl's name was Erica.ScenesChandler: Yeah. It's a shame you two didn't get to spend more time together.ScenesMonica: Yeah, we named the boy Jack after dad.ScenesRoss: Aw, he's gonna be so happy.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, Jack Bing. I love that. Ooh, it sounds like a '40s newspaper guy, you know? "Jack Bing, Morning Gazette. I'm gonna blow this story wide open!Scenes(Chandler and Monica carry Erica and Jack over to the crib and put them down carefully.)ScenesRachel: Oh my gosh. Wow, so beautiful.ScenesMike: (To Phoebe) I want one.ScenesPhoebe: Oh yeah? Well, tell me which one, and I'll try slip it in my coat.ScenesMike: Seriously. Wanna make one of those?ScenesPhoebe: One? How about a whole bunch?ScenesMike: Really?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah! Ooh, we could teach them to sing, and we can be like the Von Trapp family! Only without the Nazis. Although that sounds kinda dull.ScenesRachel: Oh, you guys, I can't believe this. But I'll leave now, or I'm gonna miss my plane.ScenesMonica: I'm just so glad you got to see the babies.Scenes(They hug.)ScenesRachel: Me too. Oh, I'm just sorry I'm not gonna be around to watch you two attempt to handle this! Alright, I can't say goodbye to you guys again. I love you all so much.ScenesMonica: I love you.ScenesChandler: I love you.ScenesMonica: Call us when you get there.ScenesRachel: I will. Ross, come here.Scenes(She pulls him over to the door.)ScenesRachel: I just want you to know.. Last night.. I'll never forget it.ScenesRoss: Neither will I.Scenes(They hug as Phoebe and Joey stare at the two of them.)ScenesRachel: Alright, now I really have to go. Okay. Au revoir! Oh, they're gonna really hate me over there.Scenes(She leaves.)ScenesPhoebe: So, you just let her go?ScenesRoss: Yeah.ScenesJoey: Hey, maybe that's for the best.ScenesRoss: Yeah?ScenesJoey: Yeah. You know? You just... Look, you gotta... You gotta think about last night the way she does, okay? Maybe, maybe sleeping together was the perfect way to say goodbye?ScenesPhoebe: But now she'll never know how he feels!ScenesJoey: Maybe that's okay. You know? Maybe, maybe it is better this way? I mean, now, now you can move on. I mean, you've been trying to for so long, maybe now that you're on different continents.. (Looks at Phoebe) Right?Scenes(Phoebe nods.)ScenesJoey: Maybe now you can actually do it. You know? You can finally get over her.ScenesRoss: Yeah, that's true. Except I don't wanna get over her.ScenesJoey: What?ScenesRoss: I don't! I wanna be with her.ScenesJoey: Really?ScenesRoss: Yeah, I'm gonna go after her.ScenesJoey: Yeah, you are!ScenesPhoebe: Woo!Scenes(Monica and Chandler look shocked as Ross goes to leave.)ScenesPhoebe: Wait, wait! Get your coat! Get your coat!ScenesRoss: My coat...ScenesJoey: This is so cool!ScenesChandler: I have no idea what's going on, but I am excited!ScenesJoey: But Ross, Ross. What do you, what do you think she's going to say?ScenesRoss: I don't know, but I.. Look, even if she shoots me down, at least I won't spend the rest of my life wondering what would have happened. Where - where is my coat?!ScenesPhoebe: You didn't bring one! My cab's downstairs, I'll drive you to the airport.ScenesRoss: Okay, guys, wish me luck.ScenesPhoebe: Hurry!ScenesJoey: Good luck, good luck!Scenes(Phoebe and Ross leave.)Scenes

rows.Scenes: The street right in front of Central Perk. Phoebe's cab is there. Ross and Phoebe run over and jump in.]
rows.Content: Ross: There's no seatbelt!ScenesPhoebe: That's okay. If - if we hit anything, the engine will explode, so you know, it's better if you're thrown from the car.Scenes(Ross looks terrified.)ScenesRoss: Alright, alright, let's do this!ScenesPhoebe: Okay!Scenes(A guy comes up and gets into the backseat of the cab.)ScenesRoss: Hey!ScenesMan: 18th and East End.ScenesPhoebe: I - I don't take passengers.ScenesMan: Hey! The law says you have to accept any fare.ScenesRoss: No, you don't understand. This isn't a real cab.ScenesMan: Alright, I gotta report you. What's your medallion number?ScenesPhoebe: My medallion number is, "Get out of the cab!ScenesMan: What?ScenesRoss: (screaming) Get out of the cab!ScenesPhoebe: Get out of the cab!Scenes(The man jumps out, obviously a little scared. Phoebe drives off.)Scenes

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's apartment. Monica, Chandler and Joey are there, packing the last boxes.]
rows.Content: Joey: Oh, hey, hey, can I give you guys your house-warming present now?ScenesMonica: Now, that you can do.ScenesJoey: Alright!Scenes(Cut to Joey's apartment. Joey looks inside the cardboard box that used to be the home of Chick Jr. and Duck Jr., but they have disappeared.)ScenesJoey: Ah... Chick Jr.? Duck Jr.? Don't hide from mama!Scenes

rows.Scenes: Phoebe's cab. Phoebe is driving very fast, and a terrified Ross has closed his eyes.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: You can open your eyes now.ScenesRoss: Are we off the bridge?ScenesPhoebe: Yes.ScenesRoss: Is the old woman on the bicycle still alive?ScenesPhoebe: Yes, she jumped right back up.Scenes(Ross opens his eyes.)ScenesRoss: Oh my God, Phoebe, slow down!ScenesPhoebe: Do you wanna get to Rachel in time?ScenesRoss: Yes, but I don't wanna die in your cab!ScenesPhoebe: You should have thought of that before you got in!Scenes(They drive up to a toll-booth.)ScenesPhoebe: Toll-booth.ScenesRoss: What?ScenesPhoebe: (screaming) Toll-booth! Four bucks. There are quarters in the glove compartment.Scenes(Ross tries to open a plastic bag filled with quarters, but he's quite slow.)ScenesPhoebe: Hurry!ScenesRoss: Okay!ScenesPhoebe: Okay.Scenes(Phoebe tries to throw some quarters out the window, but she has forgotten to open the window, and she and Ross scream.)ScenesPhoebe: Damn, that window is clean.Scenes

rows.Scenes: Joey's apartment. Joey is still looking for the birds.]
rows.Content: Joey: Quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack, quack, tweet, tweet, quack, tweet, quack...Scenes(Monica and Chandler enter.)ScenesChandler: We were wondering what was taking so long with the gift, but now we understand you were doing this.ScenesJoey: Okay, I wanted to surprise you, but for your house-warming gift, I got you a baby-chick and a baby-duck!Scenes(Chandler grins, while Monica is less enthusiastic.)ScenesChandler: Really? You got us a chick and a duck?ScenesMonica: Oh, great! Just what you want for a new house with infants. Bird feces.ScenesJoey: Yeah, yeah, they must have jumped off the table, 'cause now they're gone!ScenesChandler: Oh, don't worry, we'll find them.ScenesMonica: Actually, I'm gonna go check on the twins.ScenesChandler: Alright.Scenes(Monica turns around and is about to leave when she steps on something.)ScenesMonica: Oh God! What did I just step on?ScenesJoey: Oh!ScenesChandler: It's okay, it's just an egg roll.ScenesMonica: Oh..ScenesJoey: You stepped on my egg roll?ScenesMonica: I'm sorry, I didn't know to look for Chinese food on the floor.ScenesJoey: Just put it on a plate and leave.Scenes(She does so.)ScenesChandler: Okay, let's find these birds.ScenesJoey: Alright.Scenes(Suddenly, they hear the birds.)ScenesJoey: Wait, wait. Do you hear that?Scenes(They realise that the birds are in the foosball table.)ScenesJoey: Oh! They're in the table!ScenesChandler: Well, that can't be good!ScenesJoey: We gotta get them out of there!ScenesChandler: How?ScenesJoey: Oh, oh! Maybe we can lure them out. You know any birdcalls?ScenesChandler: Oh, tons, I'm quite the woodsman.ScenesJoey: Well, maybe we can just tip the table a little.ScenesChandler: Joey, wait! The ball!ScenesJoey: Oh!Scenes(The ball rolls into one of the goals, and Chandler and Joey listen in horror as the ball makes its way inside the table. Finally, they can hear the birds again.)ScenesJoey: Oh God! So what do we do?ScenesChandler: I don't know. Maybe we can open this up somehow.ScenesJoey: Okay.ScenesChandler: No... It's all glued together.ScenesJoey: Does that mean we have to bust it open?ScenesChandler: I don't know. Maybe.ScenesJoey: Oh my God!ScenesChandler: I know! It's.. It's the foosball table.ScenesJoey: All right, you know what? We don't have a choice. It's like I would have said in that sci-fi movie if I'd gotten the part. "Those are our men in there, we have to get them out! Even if I have to sacrifice the most important thing in my life; my time-machine.ScenesChandler: Did that movie ever get made?ScenesJoey: It did not.Scenes

rows.Scenes: The airport. Ross and Phoebe run in.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Ross, where are you going?ScenesRoss: To talk to Rachel, isn't that why we took a ride in the death-cab?ScenesPhoebe: What? What are you just gonna walk up to her at the gate? Have you never chased anyone through the airport before?ScenesRoss: Not since my cop-show got cancelled.ScenesPhoebe: You have to get a ticket to get past security.ScenesRoss: What? We're never gonna make it!ScenesPhoebe: Not with that attitude! Now, haul ass!Scenes(They run to the ticket counter, but they get stuck behind a group of old people who are walking very slowly.)ScenesRoss: Okay, if you could all walk slower, that'd be great.Scenes

rows.Scenes: The gate. Rachel walks up to the man at the gate and gives him her passport.]
rows.Content: Gate attendant #1: (with a French accent) Madame, your passport please?ScenesRachel: Oh my God! I was so afraid I wasn't gonna remember any of my high-school French, but I understood every word you just said!ScenesGate attendant #1: Your boarding pass, please.ScenesRachel: Oh.Scenes(She starts looking through her purse, but she can't find it.)ScenesRachel: Oh, shoot. I had it. Oh, I can't believe this.ScenesGate attendant #1: Madame, if you don't have your boarding pass...ScenesRachel: I have it, I have it, I have it. Oh, okay, I can't find it, but I remember that I was in seat 32C, because that's my bra-size.ScenesGate attendant #1: Madame, you must have your boarding pass..ScenesRachel: Okay, fine! But you know what? If I was in 36D, we would not be having this problem.Scenes

rows.Scenes: The ticket-counter. Ross and Phoebe come running.]
rows.Content: Ross: Hey, I need a ticket.ScenesPhoebe: Just one? I drive you all the way down here, and I don't get to see how it works out?ScenesRoss: Fine, two tickets, I need two tickets.ScenesPhoebe: We're on our honeymoon.ScenesTicket agent: And the destination?ScenesRoss: I don't care. Whatever is the cheapest.ScenesPhoebe: I'm so lucky I married you.Scenes

rows.Scenes: The gate. Rachel is still searching for her boarding pass.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Oh! Shoot! Damn it! Where is it? Oh! Oh! I found it! I found it!Scenes(She runs up to the gate and the gate attendant standing there.)ScenesRachel: Hah! I found it! I told you I would find it! In your face! You're a different person.Scenes

rows.Scenes: The ticket-counter. Ross and Phoebe have their tickets and start looking at the screens in order to find the gate.]
rows.Content: Ross: Okay, flight 421 to Paris. I don't see it, do you see it?ScenesPhoebe: No, did we miss it?ScenesRoss: No, no, no. That's impossible. It doesn't leave for another 20 minutes.ScenesPhoebe: Maybe we have the flight-number wrong. God.Scenes(Phoebe picks up her cell-phone and calls Monica. Monica is still packing in her apartment.)ScenesMonica: Hello.ScenesPhoebe: Hey, it's me. Here's Ross.ScenesRoss: What? Hey, hey, listen..Scenes(Monica is standing by the crib, and she's looking at her babies.)ScenesMonica: Oh my God! Ross, you wouldn't believe the cute little noises the twins are making. Listen.Scenes(She holds the phone down to the twins.)ScenesRoss: Monica? Monica, Monica, Monica, Monica..?ScenesMonica: Oh, I'm sorry. Shoot, they were doing it before.ScenesRoss: That's alright. Listen, listen.ScenesMonica: Oh, wait, wait, wait! Here they go again.Scenes(She holds down the phone to the twins again.)ScenesRoss: Monica? Monica, Monica, Monica, Monica..?ScenesMonica: Isn't that cute?ScenesRoss: That is precious! Listen! I need Rachel's flight information.ScenesMonica: Oh, okay. Alright, it's flight 421. Leaves at 8:40.ScenesRoss: Yes, that's what I have. It's not on the board.ScenesMonica: That's what it says here. Flight 421, leaves at 8:40, Newark airport.ScenesRoss: What?ScenesMonica: Newark airport. Why, where are you?ScenesRoss: JFK.Scenes(Ross sadly hangs up the phone, while Phoebe looks at him. Cut to Rachel at the gate. She gives her boarding pass to the gate attendant, and she goes onboard. The gate attendant closes the door and locks it.)Scenes

rows.Scenes: Joey's apartment. Joey and Chandler are still trying to get the birds out of the foosball-table.]
rows.Content: Joey: (yelling) Don't worry, you guys, we're gonna get you out of there.ScenesChandler: And we're also gonna buy you tiny, bird hearing-aids.Scenes(Joey picks up a hammer and a crowbar and gets ready to destroy the table.)ScenesJoey: Okay. Here goes.ScenesChandler: What's the matter?ScenesJoey: I need to say goodbye to the table first.ScenesChandler: I understand.ScenesJoey: Okay. Table, you have given us so many great times. And you guys, Jordan, Victor, Joel... All of you guys. What can I say? You guys make us look good. You wanna say anything?ScenesChandler: I don't know. Except that, for one last time... (he touches the players as he says the following) Good game, good game, good game, good game, good game, good game, good game.ScenesJoey: Okay, here we go. I can't do it.ScenesChandler: Well, I can't do it either.Scenes(Monica enters.)ScenesMonica: Hey! Did you find them?ScenesJoey: Yeah, they're stuck inside the table!ScenesChandler: We have to bust it open, but neither of us can do it!ScenesMonica: Oh, well sure. This gotta be so hard. I'll do it. Gimme!Scenes(Monica grabs the hammer and the crowbar and gets ready to bust it open.)Scenes

rows.Scenes: Phoebe's cab. She's driving faster than ever before.]
rows.Content: Ross: Phoebe! Wow! No, no, no!Scenes(Phoebe screams.)ScenesPhoebe: Well, I've never gone this fast before.ScenesRoss: Phoebe, forget it, okay? Newark is - is like an hour away. There's no way we're gonna make it in time.ScenesPhoebe: She's got her cell, you could call her.ScenesRoss: I am not doing this over the phone.ScenesPhoebe: You don't have any other choice!Scenes(She lets go of the steering wheel to get her cell-phone from her purse. Ross screams and reaches over in order to hold onto the wheel. Cut to the plane. Rachel is sitting in her seat when her cell-phone rings.)ScenesRachel: Hello?ScenesPhoebe: Rachel? Oh, good. Hey, by the way, did you just get on the plane?ScenesRachel: Yeah.ScenesPhoebe: (To Ross) For what it's worth, we would have caught her if we were at the right airport.ScenesRoss: Yay.ScenesPhoebe: Uh, Rach, hang on.Scenes(Phoebe tries to give her phone to Ross, but he won't take it. He mouths "no.")ScenesRachel: Phoebe? Is everything okay?ScenesPhoebe: Uhm, actually no. No, you've... You have to get off the plane.ScenesRachel: What? Why?ScenesPhoebe: I have this feeling that something's wrong with it. Something is wrong with the left Philange.ScenesRachel: Oh, honey, I'm sure there's nothing wrong with the plane.Scenes(The passenger in the seat next to Rachel looks at her and seems a little nervous.)ScenesRachel: Alright, look, I have to go. I love you, and I will call you the minute I get to Paris.Scenes(Rachel hangs up.)ScenesPassenger #1: Uhm, what was that?ScenesRachel: Oh, that was just my crazy friend. She told me I should get off the plane, because she had a feeling that there was something wrong with the left Philange.ScenesPassenger #1: Okay, that doesn't sound good.ScenesRachel: I wouldn't worry about it. She's always coming up with stuff like this, and you know what? She's almost never right.ScenesPassenger #1: But she is sometimes.ScenesRachel: Well...Scenes(The passenger stands up and gets his suitcase from the overhead compartment.)ScenesRachel: Wait, what are you doing?ScenesPassenger #1: Well, I can't take this plane now.ScenesAir stewardess: Excuse me, sir, where are you going?ScenesPassenger #1: I have to get off this plane, okay? Her friend has a feeling something's wrong with the left Philange.ScenesRachel: Could I get some peanuts?ScenesPassenger #2: What's wrong with the plane?ScenesAir stewardess: There's nothing wrong with the plane.ScenesPassenger #1: Yeah! The left Philange!ScenesAir stewardess: There is no Philange!ScenesPassenger #1: Oh my God. This plane doesn't even have a Philange!ScenesPassenger #2: I'm not flying on it!ScenesAir stewardess: Ma'am, please sit down!ScenesPassenger #3: What's going on?ScenesPassenger #1: We're all getting off. There is no Philange!Scenes(Everybody walks out of the plane.)ScenesRachel: This is ridiculous! I...Scenes(She notices that everybody is leaving.)ScenesRachel: Yeah, okay.Scenes(Rachel leaves as well.)Scenes

rows.Scenes: Joey's apartment. Monica has completely destroyed the foosball-table, and Chandler and Joey are holding the birds.]
rows.Content: Monica: Alright. My job here is done.ScenesChandler: That was... Impressive.ScenesJoey: Yeah, you didn't even use the tools for most of it!ScenesMonica: Yeah, they were just slowing me down. Alright, I have to get back to the babies. I'll see you girls later.Scenes(Monica leaves.)ScenesChandler: Sorry about the table, man.ScenesJoey: Yeah.ScenesChandler: You gonna buy a new one?ScenesJoey: Probably not. Nah. I don't know how much I'm gonna wanna play after you go.ScenesChandler: Well, at least we got these little guys out.ScenesJoey: Yeah.ScenesChandler: Aww, we were worried about you! Hm. I guess I better get used to things crapping in my hand, huh?ScenesJoey: I'm gonna miss these little guys. It was nice having birds around again.ScenesChandler: Hey, you know what? Maybe we should keep them here with you.ScenesJoey: What?ScenesChandler: Yeah, I mean we've got a lot going on right now. And, plus, here they'd have their own room.ScenesJoey: I could get a goose!ScenesChandler: You know, I - I think you're set with the poultry.ScenesJoey: Thanks man. Did you hear that, you guys? You're gonna get to stay here! And, and it's good, you know, 'cause, 'cause now you have a reason to come visit.ScenesChandler: I think there may be another reason. So, awkward hug or lame cool guy handshake?ScenesJoey: Uh, lame cool guy handshake, yeah.Scenes(They do the lame cool guy handshake. They look at each other, and then they hug.)Scenes

rows.Scenes: The gate at the airport. The passengers are standing in line, and they're about to board the plane again.]
rows.Content: Gate attendant #2: Ma'am, I assure you, the plane is fine.ScenesPassenger #2: And you fixed the Philange?ScenesGate attendant #2: Yes, the Philange is fixed. As a matter of fact, we put a whole lot of extra Philanges onboard, just in case.Scenes(Rachel walks up to the gate. Cut to Ross and Phoebe who come running up to the gate.)ScenesRoss: Where is she?ScenesPhoebe: I don't see her.ScenesRoss: Rachel! Rachel Green!ScenesPhoebe: There she is!ScenesRoss: Rachel! Rachel!ScenesGate attendant #2: Wow, excuse me, sir, do you have a boarding pass?ScenesRoss: No, no, I just have to talk to someone.ScenesGate attendant #2: I'm sorry, you cannot go any further without a boarding pass.ScenesRoss: No, no, no, but...ScenesPhoebe: (screaming) RACHEL!!Scenes(Rachel comes back to the gate.)ScenesRachel: Oh my God... What.. What are you guys doing here?ScenesPhoebe: Okay, you're on.ScenesRachel: What? What? Ross, you're scaring me. What's going on?ScenesRoss: Okay, the thing is..ScenesRachel: Yeah?ScenesRoss: Don't go.ScenesRachel: What?ScenesRoss: Please, please stay with me. I am so in love with you. Please, don't go.ScenesRachel: Oh my God.ScenesRoss: I know, I know. I shouldn't have waited 'till now to say it, but I'm.. That was stupid, okay? I'm sorry, but I'm telling you now. I love you. Do not get on this plane.ScenesGate attendant #2: Miss? Are you boarding the plane?ScenesRoss: Hey, hey. I know you love me. I know you do.ScenesGate attendant #2: Miss?ScenesRachel: I - I have to get on the plane.ScenesRoss: No, you don't.ScenesRachel: Yes, I do.ScenesRoss: No, you don't.ScenesRachel: They're waiting for me, Ross. I can't do this right now, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.ScenesRoss: Rachel?ScenesRachel: I'm so sorry.Scenes(She boards the plane.)ScenesRoss: I really thought she'd stay.ScenesPhoebe: I'm sorry.Scenes(Phoebe hugs Ross.)Scenes

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's apartment. Joey, Chandler, Monica and the twins are there. Everything has been put into boxes.]
rows.Content: Monica: Well, that's it. Everything's packed.ScenesChandler: Wow, this is weird.ScenesMonica: I know.ScenesJoey: Yeah. Uh, does this mean there's nothing to eat?ScenesMonica: I put three lasagnas in your freezer.ScenesJoey: I love you!Scenes(He hugs her. Phoebe enters.)ScenesJoey: Hey!ScenesPhoebe: Hey.ScenesJoey: So did you guys make it in time?ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, yeah, he talked to her, but she got on the plane anyway.ScenesChandler: Where's Ross?ScenesPhoebe: He went home. He didn't want to see anybody.Scenes

rows.Scenes: Ross's apartment. Ross enters and checks his messages.]
rows.Content: Rachel: (on the answering machine) Ross, hi. It's me. I just got back on the plane. And I just feel awful. That is so not how I wanted things to end with us. It's just that I wasn't expecting to see you, and all of a sudden you're there and saying these things... And... And now I'm just sitting here and thinking of all the stuff I should have said, and I didn't. I mean, I didn't even get to tell you that I love you too. Because of course I do. I love you. I love you. I love you. What am I doing? I love you! Oh, I've gotta see you. I've gotta get off this plane.ScenesRoss: Oh my God!ScenesRachel: (on the answering machine) Excuse me?ScenesAir stewardess: (on the answering machine) Miss? Please, sit down!ScenesRachel: (on the answering machine) I'm sorry. I'm really sorry, but I need to get off the plane, okay? I need to tell someone that I love love them.ScenesAir stewardess: (on the answering machine) Miss, I can't let you off the plane.ScenesRoss: Let her off the plane!ScenesAir stewardess: (on the answering machine) I am afraid you are gonna have to take a seat.ScenesRachel: (on the answering machine) Oh, please, miss, you don't understand!ScenesRoss: Try to understand!ScenesRachel: (on the answering machine) Oh, come on, miss, isn't there any way that you can just let me off...Scenes(The message is finished. Ross jumps over to the answering machine.)ScenesRoss: No! No! Oh my God. Did she get off the plane? Did she get off the plane?ScenesRachel: I got off the plane.ScenesRoss: You got off the plane.Scenes(He walks over and kisses her.)ScenesRachel: I do love you.ScenesRoss: I love you too, and I'm never letting you go again.ScenesRachel: Okay. 'Cause this is where I wanna be, okay? No more messing around. I don't wanna mess this up again.ScenesRoss: Me neither, okay? We are - we're done being stupid.ScenesRachel: Okay. You and me, alright? This is it.ScenesRoss: This is it. Unless we're on a break.Scenes(Rachel gives him a look.)ScenesRoss: Don't make jokes now.Scenes(They kiss again.)Scenes

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's apartment. Chandler and Monica are holding the twins. Joey and Phoebe are sitting by the window, while Ross and Rachel are standing together. The apartment is completely empty. Two men are carrying a large dresser.]
rows.Content: Monica: Okay, please be careful with that. It was my grandmother's. Be careful.Scenes(Two other men are rolling the big white dog out of the apartment.)ScenesMonica: If that falls off the truck, it wouldn't be the worst thing.Scenes(She slips them some money.)ScenesRoss: Wow.ScenesRachel: I know. It seems smaller somehow.ScenesJoey: Has it always been purple?ScenesChandler: (to his children) Look around, you guys. This was your first home. And it was a happy place, filled with love and laughter. But more important, because of rent control, it was a friggin' steal!Scenes(Monica and Chandler put Jack and Erica in their stroller.)ScenesPhoebe: Hey, do you realise that at one time or another we all lived in this apartment?ScenesMonica: Oh, yeah, that's true.ScenesRoss: Uh, I haven't.ScenesMonica: Wait a minute. What about that summer during college that you lived with grandma, and you tried to make it as a dancer?ScenesRoss: Do you realise we almost made it ten years without that coming up?ScenesMonica: Oh, honey, I forgot. I promised Treeger that we'd leave our keys.ScenesChandler: Oh, okay.Scenes(Chandler and Monica walk over to the kitchen-counter and leave their keys. Then the other four pick out their keys and leave them as well.)ScenesPhoebe: So, I guess this is it.ScenesJoey: Yeah. I guess so.ScenesMonica: (crying) This is harder than I thought it would be.ScenesChandler: Oh, it's gonna be okay.Scenes(Chandler hugs her. Monica hugs Ross and Rachel as Chandler gets the stroller with the twins.)ScenesRachel: (crying) Do you guys have to go to the new house right away, or do you have some time?ScenesMonica: We got some time.ScenesRachel: Okay, should we get some coffee?ScenesChandler: Sure. Where?Scenes(They all leave the apartment. Joey helps Chandler with the stroller in the hallway, while Monica and Rachel have their arms around each other. Everybody walks downstairs to Central Perk. The camera goes inside the apartment again, and it pans around. We see the keys on the counter, and the final shot is of the frame around the peephole. The screen fades to black.)ScenesTHE ENDScenes1001 - The One After Joey And Rachel KissScenesWritten by: Andrew Reich & Ted CohenScenesTranscribed by: Coffee Mug

rows.Scenes: Barbados, Monica and Chandler's Room. They both enter from Ross's room. Monica still has her big, frizzy hair.]
rows.Content: Monica: Oh, the way you crushed Mike at ping pong was such a turn-on.You wanna...? (plays with her finger on Chandlers chest)ScenesChandler: You know, I'd love to, but I'm a little tired.ScenesMonica: I'll put a pillowcase over my head.ScenesChandler: You're on!Scenes(they start to get ready, but then Phoebe enters through the door from Ross's room)ScenesPhoebe: Hey!ScenesMonica: What's up?ScenesPhoebe: Well, okay, Mike's taking a shower, which by the way there's no law against. And then we're gonna grab some food, so if you want...Scenes(there's a door slamming in Ross's room, and some indistinct murmuring)ScenesRoss: ... finally...ScenesPhoebe: Is that Ross?ScenesMonica: Yeah, you can hear everything through these stupid walls.ScenesPhoebe: Sounds like he's with someone.ScenesChandler: He could be alone. This morning I heard him do push-ups, and then talk to his triceps.ScenesMonica: Wait a minute, I think Phoebe's right. You know I hear someone else in there with him.Scenes(they all put their ear against the wall to be able to hear what's being said. We move to Ross's room where he and Charlie are kissing.)ScenesCharlie: Ooh... Dr. Geller!ScenesRoss: God, you're amazing... I didn't even have to ask you to call me that.ScenesMonica: Oh my God, that's Charlie!ScenesChandler: She's cheating on Joey with Ross!ScenesPhoebe: Oh that tart... floozy... giant...ScenesMonica: I'm not sure about this.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, you're right. This is none of our business.ScenesMonica: No I'm not sure that it's the best way to hear everything. Someone get me a glass!ScenesPhoebe: Oh, I'm not gonna do this, okay? I'm not gonna eavesdrop on my friend.ScenesRachel: (through wall) Ooh... I love Barbados!Scenes(Phoebe starts to listen at the other wall, where Rachel's room is. There, Joey and Rachel are kissing.)ScenesJoey: Ooh... I can't believe I'm kissing you. I'm kissing Rachel!ScenesRachel: I know, I'm her!Scenes(they start to kiss again, and Phoebe turns to Chandler and Monica)ScenesPhoebe: (whispering) Rachel and Joey! It's Rachel and Joey!!!ScenesMonica: What?ScenesPhoebe: Get over here!Scenes(Chandler and Monica take a sprint to the other wall)ScenesRachel: ooh...ScenesChandler: Wow!ScenesMonica: (in her Monica-excited-way... TOO LOUD!) Oh my God, I love how thin these walls are!Scenes(In the rooms next door, Joey, Rachel, Ross and Charlie stop kissing and try to understand what the yelling was about. After a while they continue kissing. We're back in Chandler and Monica's room. Monica has some of her own hair stuffed in her mouth by Chandler.)ScenesMonica: (muffled) Thank you.ScenesOPENING CREDITSScenes(Rachel and Joey's)ScenesRachel: Hey, you know, before you said that nothing could happen between us? What changed?ScenesJoey: Well, I only said that because of Ross, you know. Then I saw him kissing Charlie...ScenesRachel: What? Ross and Charlie? (Joey nods) Wow! She's really making her way through the group, huh? Ah, who am I to talk?Scenes(Chandler and Monica's)ScenesMonica: I can't believe this. Rachel and Joey?ScenesChandler: How about the dinosaur twins in the other room? No-one is manning that wall!ScenesMonica: I'm on it!ScenesChandler: Anything?ScenesMonica: I think I hear curtains closing...ScenesPhoebe: We've got shoes being kicked off over here.ScenesMonica: Bedsprings, unmistakable!ScenesChandler: You do realise that's your brother?ScenesMonica: Not until you said it. Somebody switch! (Chandler makes a clicking sound with his fingers and Phoebe runs to the other wall. Monica returns to Chandlers wall.) Wait a minute... Ross and Charlie, Joey and Rachel, Phoebe and Mike! We're the only people leaving with the same person we came with.ScenesChandler: That's not true. I came with Monica and I'm leaving with Weird Al.ScenesMonica: Okay, I've had it with the hair jokes. Tomorrow morning, before we leave, I'm going to the salon.ScenesChandler: Okay Buckwheat!ScenesPhoebe: You gotta hear this, it's great... It's like free porn! (Chandler eagerly rushes over)Scenes(Ross and Charlie's)ScenesRoss: Weh...*sigh*ScenesCharlie: uhm... Is everything okay?ScenesRoss: Yeah, It's just... I don't think I can do this...ScenesCharlie: Ooh... Is it because of what might be on the bedspread, because I saw that news report too, with the infra red and the ... I could just...ScenesRoss: No, NO! (they're moving to the side of the bed, where they sit down) Look, I need to talk to Joey. I mean, you guys just broke up. Before anything more happens between us, I need to know he's okay with it.ScenesCharlie: I uhm... I completely understand.ScenesRoss: Alright, I'm gonna go find them... (twitches a bit, looks down) I just need a... need a before I can... you know. (gestures standing up... they sit and wait for a while) Grandma... grandma... grandma... (he tries to concentrate...) Okay, I see you later.ScenesCharlie: Okay...Scenes(Chandler and Monica's, all three of them are listening at the wall to Ross and Charlie's)ScenesPhoebe: That's the door. He's gone...ScenesChandler: And she's... turning on the TV... and watching... Miss Congeniality!ScenesMonica: Honey, if you know it through a wall, you know it too well!Scenes(They are still listening at the wall, when Ross enters their room)ScenesRoss: Hey, what are you guys doing?ScenesPhoebe: Oh, we're just... we're sad to go so we're just saying goodbye to the hotel. (hugs the wall) I love you... Paradise Hotel, Golf resort and Spa... (she walks away from the wall)ScenesMonica: (also hugs the wall) Yeah, we had a great time, thank you! (walks to Phoebe)ScenesChandler: (caresses the wall with his finger) Bye!ScenesRoss: Okay, uhm... Hey, you guys seen Joey anywhere?ScenesChandler: He's probably in his room with his current girlfriend Charlie. That's the situation as we know it... (walks to Phoebe and Monica)ScenesRoss: Well, if you see him could you please tell him I'm looking for him?ScenesChandler: You got it!ScenesRoss: Thanks! (walks out of the room and starts hugging the wall) Thank you! (closes the door)ScenesMonica: Other wall, people! Other wall!Scenes(they rush to the wall to Rachel and Joey's, and we move to that room)ScenesRoss: (knocks on door) Rach, you there? (Joey and Rachel both get up from the bed)ScenesJoey: Oh my God, it's Ross. What are we gonna do?ScenesRachel: Oh, ju-ju-just stay calm. Just be calm. For all he knows we're just hanging out together. Right? Just be nonchalant. (Joey like stands at attention with his chest forward and his hands on his sides, looking up at the ceiling with his lips pouted.) That's not nonchalant!ScenesJoey: No idea what it means.ScenesRachel: Oh... okay, just hide!ScenesRoss: (knocks) Rach?ScenesRachel: Coming! Try under the bed, try under the bed!Scenes(When Rachel starts to look under the bed if Joey would fit under there, Chandler opens the door inbetween the rooms, grabs Joey by his shirt and drags him to his room, and closes the door again)ScenesRachel: There's no room under the bed. (looks around because she can't find Joey anymore)ScenesRoss: Is everything okay?ScenesRachel: Yeah... (still looking to see where Joey went, and opens the door)ScenesRoss: Hey.ScenesRachel: Hi...ScenesRoss: You know where Joey is?ScenesRachel: ...I really don't... (looks around again)ScenesRoss: Can I talk to you for a minute?ScenesRachel: Yeah, sure... (looks outside into the corridor if Joey is there)Scenes(Monica and Chandler's room. Phoebe, Monica and Chandler have their ears pressed against the wall, and Joey looks at them)ScenesJoey: I don't believe this... Have you guys been...ScenesPhoebe: Shhh... This is the listening side of the wall.Scenes(Now Joey also wants to listen, and wants to press his ears against the door, which has a big mirror on it, he hesitates seeing himself in the mirror, but still puts his ear against it. We move again to Rachel's room.)ScenesRoss: And then she told me that she and Joey had broken up, and that part of the reason was that she had feelings for me.ScenesRachel: (clearly not listening and still trying to find out where Joey went) Uh-huh... right... yeah...ScenesRoss: And you know I wanted to ask Charlie out since the day I met her.ScenesRachel: (still searching) Oh, I know... I know it's been really hard for you.ScenesRoss: Anyway, one thing lead to another, and... oh... before you know it, we were kissing. I mean, how angry do you think Joey is gonna be?ScenesRachel: (now looking up at the ceiling) That is hard to say, Ross. That is hard to say.ScenesRoss: You know, I gotta go find him. He's gotta be here someplace.ScenesRachel: You would think!Scenes(Ross leaves the room)ScenesRachel: Joey!ScenesJoey: Is he gone?ScenesRachel: (still can't find him) How are you doing this?Scenes(Joey now enters the room through the door, Monica, Chandler and Phoebe are following him.)ScenesJoey: Pssst...ScenesRachel: How... wha... Hey! What are you... What is this? Have you guys been listening this entire time?ScenesMonica, Chandler and Phoebe: YE-AH!ScenesPhoebe: Now, what is this?ScenesRachel: Ah, what is this? Well, lets see, we kissed for ten minutes and now we're talking to our friends about it, so I guess this is sixth grade!ScenesPhoebe: Oh no... Have you thought about it how complicated this could get? What about Ross?ScenesJoey: Well, he's with Charlie now.ScenesMonica: Yeah, but he wants to talk to you before anything really happens with her. And as his friend, I mean, don't you think he deserves the same from you?ScenesJoey: (long pause and he twitches a bit) You're a pain in my ass, Geller!ScenesRachel: All right, look you guys... Look, we appreciate all the advice, but this is between Joey and me and I think we can handle it...ScenesChandler: Okay, well we'll go back in there, but will you do one thing for us? The people that care about you?ScenesRachel: Sure...ScenesChandler: Enunciate!ScenesRachel: Get out!Scenes(They leave and Rachel locks the door.)ScenesRachel: Are they right?ScenesJoey: Probably, yeah... I mean, maybe we should... hold off until we talk to Ross.ScenesRachel: Yeah... Yeah, we can wait, we don't have to do anything tonight.ScenesJoey: Yeah, I think that'd be best... So, so I'm gonna... I'm gonna take off...ScenesRachel: (Joey walks to the door) Although...ScenesJoey: (turns around very fast) I like although!ScenesRachel: I mean, you know... Ross and I haven't dated in like... six years...ScenesJoey: Six years? Wow... It's almost as long as highschool...ScenesRachel: Plus, you know, he is with Charlie now.ScenesJoey: Absolutely! He's not thinking about you.ScenesRachel: No...ScenesJoey: I'm thinking about you...ScenesRachel: Yeah...ScenesJoey: Let's forget about Ross...ScenesRachel: Forgotten.Scenes(They want to kiss, but just before their lips touch, Rachel pulls back quickly, gasping)ScenesJoey: What's wrong?ScenesRachel: Nothing...ScenesJoey's voice, but she sees Ross: Seriously... What is it?ScenesRachel: Nothing... It's really... It's nothing... Come here, come here...Scenes(again, just before their lips touch, she pulls back, gasping)ScenesJoey's voice/Ross: What's wrong?ScenesRachel: Sorry, I just uhm... I can't seem to get Ross out of my head...ScenesJoey: Well, maybe I can help. (he grabs her head passionately, closes his eyes and kisses... Ross in Rachel's dress! He realises it too late, and when he does, pushes Ross's/Rachel's head away)ScenesRachel/Ross: Ooh, your lips are so soft... Do that again... (and she/he moves in for another kiss. Joey, pushes her head away again...)ScenesJoey: Yeah... we really need to talk to Ross...ScenesBoth: YeahScenesCOMMERCIAL BREAK

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Monica's room. Chandler is packing when Ross knocks on the door and enters...]
rows.Content: Ross: Hey!ScenesChandler: Hey!ScenesRoss: You guys ready to go?ScenesChandler: Not quite. Monica's still at the salon, and I'm just finishing packing.ScenesRoss: Dude! You're not taking your Bible?ScenesChandler: You're not supposed to take that. Besides, it's a New Testament, what are you gonna do with it?ScenesRoss: Learn about Jesus...Scenes(Charlie now also enters the room, Chandler walks to the bathroom)ScenesRoss: Hey!ScenesCharlie: So, did you talk to Joey?ScenesRoss: Uh, no... no. I couldn't find him. I'm just gonna talk to him on the plane.ScenesCharlie: Yeah, sounds like a good idea... Dr. Geller!ScenesRoss: Stop it!ScenesCharlie: PHDScenesRoss: You're filthy!Scenes(Phoebe enters)ScenesPhoebe: Hey, have you guys seen Monica?ScenesRoss: Uh, actually I think she went to the salon.ScenesPhoebe: Oh yeah, oh, she went to the salon alright...Scenes(Monica enters, with her hair braided and little shells at the end)ScenesMonica: Check it out!ScenesPhoebe: Who's day just got better? CHANDLER!Scenes(Chandler enters from the bathroom)ScenesChandler: Hey!... aaaaaahhhh!ScenesMonica: What do you think?ScenesChandler: I think.... I think I can see your scalp.ScenesMonica: Don't you just love it?ScenesRoss: Ye... Yeah... Yeah... You got shellfish in your head.ScenesCharlie: It's so... something... You go girlfriend!ScenesRoss: You've never said that in your life, have you?ScenesCharlie: Not once.ScenesRoss: I thought so.ScenesMonica: And listen to this... (shakes her body so the shells tingle)ScenesChandler: What d'ya know... It's a treat for the eyes and the ears.

rows.Scenes: Boarding the plane.]
rows.Content: Joey: Whoo, whoo. Wow, it's uhm... kinda weird that I'm sitting next to Charlie after we broke up.ScenesChandler: Yeah, it's almost if Air Barbados doesn't care about your social life.ScenesJoey: Look, does someone mind switching to sit with Charlie?ScenesRoss: Oh, I uh, I mean, I... dude, I spent the whole conference with Charlie.ScenesJoey: I understand...ScenesRoss: No, I'll do it. (he quickly grabs Joey's boarding pass and gives Joey his one.)ScenesChandler: Wish I could switch with someone. I really don't wanna sit with Allen Iverson over there.Scenes(Switch to Phoebe and Mike, who are kissing)ScenesPhoebe: Uhm... You know, once we're in the air and the captain turns off the seatbelt sign... you feel free to roam about my cabin...ScenesMike: You should be careful when checking your overhead bins, 'cause items may shift during...ScenesPhoebe: Aaah... you're not good at this...ScenesMike: You don't have to go home tonight, do you?ScenesPhoebe: No, I think I can come over. It's Saturday, right?ScenesMike: Oh...ScenesPhoebe: What?ScenesMike: Uhm... I can't do anything tonight.ScenesPhoebe: Why not?ScenesMike: I have a date.ScenesPhoebe: You have a... You have a date? With who?ScenesMike: Oh, it's... my girlfriend.ScenesPhoebe: (lets go of his hand) You have... have a girlfriend?ScenesMike: Yeah... Well, when... you and I broke up I started seeing someone.ScenesPhoebe: For how long?ScenesMike: Three months.ScenesPhoebe: Three months? Okay... This is probably none of my business, but uhm, how long do you think you're gonna keep seeing her?ScenesMike: I'll tell her that it's over tonight at dinner. I promise.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, okay... good. You do that. And then when you get home, maybe there'll be a special delivery package waiting for you.ScenesMike: Maybe I'll sign for it. Tear it open. Pull out the packing material...ScenesPhoebe: You know what, we're gonna have sex. Let's just leave it there.Scenes(cut to Charlie and Ross)ScenesRoss: Right, I'm gonna go talk to Joey. I think this is the right time. He's always in a good mood after the flight attendant says "duty free".ScenesCharlie: Okay... Good luck.Scenes(Ross gets up and gestures to Rachel, we cut to Joey and Rachel)ScenesRachel: Ross is coming over. I think now would be a really good time to talk to him.ScenesJoey: I guess so. I'm just... really nervous.ScenesRachel: Okay, well keep in mind that by the time you're done, they'll probably be serving dinner.ScenesJoey: Ooh...ScenesRachel: Still nervous?ScenesJoey: I'm gonna get the lasagna.ScenesRoss: Hey Rach...ScenesRachel: Yeah!ScenesRoss: Do you mind if I sit here for a sec.?ScenesRachel: Yeah, yeah sure! Yeah! (mouths "Good luck" to Joey and gets up from her seat)ScenesRoss: Hey!ScenesJoey: Hey!ScenesRoss: So, I uhm... kinda need to talk to you about Charlie.ScenesJoey: Yeah?ScenesRoss: Okay, last night after you guys broke up... so sorry to hear about that, by the way... Well, Charlie and I were talking, and..., well...ScenesJoey: You kissed.ScenesRoss: Wha... (gasps) What? What would give you that idea?ScenesJoey: I saw you.ScenesRoss: Yeah, we kissed, but... nothing else... nothing else happened, okay.ScenesJoey: Ross, Ross, Ross... It's okay.ScenesRoss: What?ScenesJoey: It's okay. You know, I totally understand, alright? You guys, make way more sense than her and I ever did, you know. And... I want you to be happy.ScenesRoss: Are you serious?ScenesJoey: Yeah... Now I have something...ScenesRoss: I am speachless... I mean the fact that you would put my happiness first like that. I mean, you're an incredible friend, you know that?ScenesJoey: Oh... uh... look... before you...ScenesRoss: No, I mean it. You are so loyal man, and selfless, and generous...ScenesJoey: I am those things, yeah.ScenesRoss: You know what? I know Chandler longer, so I always think of him as my best friend, but now... I may have to rethink some stuff...ScenesJoey: Dude!ScenesRoss: Hey, if there is ever, anything I can do for you...ScenesJoey: I can't think of anything.Scenes(They both hug, and Rachel, who was in the back of the plane, sees this and smiles.)ScenesRoss: Thanks!ScenesJoey: Yeah.Scenes(Ross walks to the back of the plane, where Rachel is.)ScenesRachel: So hi!ScenesRoss: Hi!ScenesRachel: So you eh, you talked to Joey?ScenesRoss: Ah, yeah. We had a really good talk.ScenesRachel: Oh! That's great!ScenesRoss: Yeah!ScenesRachel: Oh, so everything's okay?ScenesRoss: Oh, no, it's great. It's great. He is... He is an amazing guy.ScenesRachel: Ah... Well, obviously I think so too.ScenesRoss: Well, I'm so excited about this.ScenesRachel: Really? Excited?ScenesRoss: Are you kidding? I have had some very dirty dreams about this...ScenesRachel: Excuse me! (and she walks back to Joey, who is still looking very impressed about what Ross said to him. Rachel looks at him and hits him.) You didn't tell him, did you?ScenesJoey: I couldn't. He was saying all these really nice things about me. I didn't want him to get mad and take 'em all back. I'm on a edge on Chandler.ScenesRachel: Oh God! Alright, fine. You know what Joey, forget it. When we go back to New York, I will tell him.ScenesJoey: Thank you. Yeah, I appreciate that.Scenes(Chandler walks by and Joey lets out an evil "muhahaho".)ScenesCOMMERCIAL BREAK

rows.Scenes: Mike's apartment. Phoebe's there and the phone rings.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Hi, Mike's place.ScenesMike: Hey, it's Mike.ScenesPhoebe: Ooh, that was fast.ScenesMike: Oh, err... no, she's not here yet. You know, I think I'm just gonna take off and break up with her over the phone...ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, you can't do that! Oh, come on Mike, strap on a pair.Why don't you just tell her that we got back together. You know, women appreciate honesty. We also appreciate gentle spanking once in a while. Just F.Y.I.ScenesMike: One more thing... There... might be a picture of Precious on my coffee table.ScenesPhoebe: Her name is Precious? Is she a purebreed or did you pick her up at the pound?ScenesMike: Anyway, I just wanna give you a heads up.ScenesPhoebe: Okay, oh and you know, if she gets upset, just scratch her tummy and give her a liver snout. (laughs and hangs up the phone)Scenes(there's knocking on the door which Phoebe opens)ScenesPrecious: Hi, I'm Precious, who are you?ScenesPhoebe: (stunned) I... I'm Phoebe.ScenesPrecious: Phoebe? Mike's ex-girlfriend Phoebe, the love of his life? That Phoebe?ScenesPhoebe: Enchanté (she holds out her hand, and they shake hands)

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Monica's apartment. Monica's carrying the laundry hamper to their coffee table.]
rows.Content: Monica: Oh, I can't wait for everyone at work to see these... (plays with her hair to make the shells tingle again) Ow!ScenesChandler: You go back to work tomorrow night, right?ScenesMonica: Yeah!ScenesChandler: So if you want people to see them, then by definition you're not having them taken out... say, at the break of dawn?ScenesMonica: Well, if I had them taken out, then I wouldn't be able to do this. (she pushes Chandler on the couch and brushes her hair and shells against Chandler's chest) You like that, right? (again, she brushes her hair against his chest and hums...)ScenesChandler: What are you singing?ScenesMonica: It's "Bolero" from "10".ScenesChandler: It's "Ride of the Valkyries" from "Apocalypse Now"... See, here's the thing: The corn rose were really a solution to your frizzy hair problem. And now that we're home, we don't have that problem anymore, so if you think about it... I hate them!ScenesMonica: You what? You said you liked them.ScenesChandler: Did I? Let's refresh. I believe what I said was that I could see your scalp.ScenesMonica: Fine, so you don't like them. Everybody else does.ScenesChandler: Again, let's journey back... As I recall what Rachel said, was she had never notice the shape of your skull before. And Joey... Well, Joey didn't realise that there was anything different.ScenesMonica: You know what? I don't care. I like it like this, and I'm gonna keep it. You're just jealous because your hair can't do this... (and she shakes her head more violently) OUCH!ScenesChandler: Hit yourself in the tooth?ScenesMonica: And the eye!

rows.Scenes: Ross's apartment.Someone's knocking on the door. Ross rushes to the door and it's Rachel with Emma.]
rows.Content: Ross: (gasps) Hi... There she is. Hi Emma. Oh my God, I missed you. (kisses her) Oh Emma, I missed you so much. Hey... Did you have a good time with grandma Green? Huh? Did she give you a bottle of anti-depressants again to use as a rattle? (to Rachel)ScenesRachel: That was one time, Ross, and they were only like 5 milligrams.ScenesRoss: Ooh hey, Emma, daddy has some presents for you okay? Okay? I want you to wait right here. Come here sweetie.ScenesRachel: Aaah... Ross, actually there's something that I really need to talk to you about.ScenesRoss: (unpacking his bag) Okay, shoot!ScenesRachel: Okay, uhm... alright, here's the deal.ScenesRoss: (gasps) OH NO!ScenesRachel: What? What is it?ScenesRoss: Oh, major shampoo explosion!ScenesRachel: Uh, look Ross, this really isn't easy.ScenesRoss: Oh, it's all over everything. Why? Why me? (looks up)ScenesRachel: Because you took three hundred bottles of shampoo?ScenesRoss: I'm sorry, I'm sorry. You were saying?ScenesRachel: Well, yeah... Okay, look it's about me and...ScenesRoss: Oh, not another one! Oh my G... And this is moisturiser. It's even harder to clean! Why? Why do bad things happen to good people?ScenesRachel: Wow! Well, clearly this is not a good time.ScenesRoss: Duh, you think? (enters the kitchen)

rows.Scenes: Mike's place. Phoebe is on the phone.]
rows.Content: Phoebe: Okay, bye. Alright, so Mike's on his way over. See, you thought you guys were meeting here, and he thought you were meeting at the restaurant, so you know... Doesn't really matter who's right or wrong. Point is... I'm gonna take off.ScenesPrecious: I'm not letting you leave until you tell me what's going on here. I mean, are you guys getting back together or something?ScenesPhoebe: Alright... Susie, can I call you Susie?ScenesPrecious: My name is Precious.ScenesPhoebe: Yeah, I can't say that. uhm... Susie, I'm gonna be straight with you... Mike and I are back together... and uhm... unfortunately that effectively ends your relationship with him. And he's very sorry about that and wishes you the best of luck in all your endeavours.ScenesPrecious: I just can't believe this... Why?ScenesPhoebe: Well, I don't...ScenesPrecious: Oh, why would he do this? I mean, what's wrong with me?ScenesPhoebe: Nothing, there's nothing wrong with you.ScenesPrecious: I mean, what the hell am I supposed to do now?ScenesPhoebe: Damn it woman, pull yourself together! Have some pride, for the love of God.Scenes(Precious starts crying)ScenesPhoebe: Okay, not a fan of the tough love.ScenesPrecious: I just can't believe that Mike didn't give me any warning.ScenesPhoebe: But he didn't really know, you know. He wasn't planning on coming to Barbados and proposing to me...ScenesPrecious: He proposed to you? This is the worst birthday ever. (she starts to cry again)ScenesPhoebe: Look, Precious... Mike's not worth this. You're an attractive, intelligent woman and let's face it, Mike's kind of a wang. I mean, he proposed to me while he was still seeing you... He was gonna break-up with you on your birthday? And, I don't like to kiss-and-tell, but he cheated on you a lot this weekend.ScenesPrecious: Oh, my God, maybe you're right. Maybe I don't need him. I deserve to be treated with respect.Scenes(Mike enters the apartment.)ScenesPrecious: Screw you, Mike. You're a coward and a bastard, and I hope you rot in hell.Scenes(she slaps him in the face, Mike looks like he doesn't believe what just happened. Precious leaves, and he turns to Phoebe.)ScenesPhoebe: You're welcome!

rows.Scenes: Chandler and Monica's. Only Chandler is in the living room and walks to the bathroom.]
rows.Content: Chandler: Honey, you've been in there for a long time... Is everything okay?ScenesMonica: Not really.Scenes(Chandler enters the bathroom, and Monica is standing there in a towel, with her hair stuck in the shower curtain.)ScenesMonica: I have a problem.ScenesChandler: Really? What happened?ScenesMonica: Well, I was dancing around, and singing "No Woman, No Cry" and I got stuck.ScenesChandler: You can't move at all?ScenesMonica: Oh, well, I can move... (she moves back and forth the shower curtain rail, opening and closing the shower curtain with her hair as she goes)ScenesChandler: If I untangle you, will you please get rid of the corn rose?ScenesMonica: (looking disappointed) I guess so...ScenesChandler: (trying to untangle her) Some of these look a little frayed.ScenesMonica: Yeah, I tried to gnaw myself free.

rows.Scenes: Rachel and Joey's apartment. Joey enters.]
rows.Content: Joey: Hey!ScenesRachel: Hi!ScenesJoey: So, did you err... did you tell Ross?ScenesRachel: Well, I tried, but then he had a shampoo related emergency. So I guess now it's your turn again.ScenesJoey: No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no... I think it's better if you tell him, you know. It's easier for a woman. That way, you know, if he gets mad, all you have to do is go... I didn't mean it. I'm so so--ooory. (he pushes his breasts together from the side)ScenesRachel: Yeah, 'cause that's what we do.ScenesJoey: Alright, alright, okay, uhm... How 'bout this, how about this? Tomorrow... tomorrow we'll both go and we'll tell him together.ScenesRachel: Okay, that sounds fair. It just means that once again we can't...ScenesJoey: I know, I know..., but that's okay. I mean, we can control ourselves, we're not animals.ScenesRachel: No! Of course we can wait. Alright, so I guess that means good night then?ScenesJoey: Yeah! Good night! (they give each other a small kiss on the mouth, and stare at each other for a while)ScenesRachel: Goo--ood night!ScenesJoey: Good night! (they give each other a kiss again, but this time it lasts longer)ScenesRachel: Seriously, good night!ScenesJoey: Stop saying good night.ScenesRachel: Okay.Scenes(Now they kiss passionately... and then Ross enters with Emma. They freeze, pull away and look at Ross who looks like he just can't believe what he's seeing. Joey straightens his shirt, and Rachel says I'm so-oo sorry, and presses her breasts together, just like Joey did before.)ScenesCOMMERCIAL BREAK

rows.Scenes: Monica and Chandler's. Monica walks in with one of those knitted Rasta hats.]
rows.Content: Monica: Look what I found in the drawer... (Chandler looks up from his book.) And you said I'd never wear this...ScenesChandler: Now that I untangled you, how 'bout you doing a little something for me?ScenesMonica: Sure, what do you have in mind?ScenesChandler: I think you know.ScenesMonica: Really? I don't really feel like it.ScenesChandler: This is what I want to do.ScenesMonica: Okay, I just don't get why you like it so much.ScenesChandler: (Picks up the "Miss Congeniality" DVD) She's an FBI agent, posing as a beauty contestant.ScenesTHE ENDScenes1002 - The One Where Ross Is FineScenesWritten by: Sherry Bilsing-Graham & Ellen PlummerScenesDirected by: Ben WeissScenesTranscribed by: Kreidy

rows.Scenes: Joey and Rachel's apartment. The scene starts where we took off in the last episode with Ross seeing Joey and Rachel kissing. Rosss tares at them.]
rows.Content: Joey: Okay, Ross, I realise that you didn't expect to walk in and see that, but.. Let me explain, okay?ScenesRachel: We weren't doing anything!ScenesJoey: Rach, he just saw us.ScenesRachel: Shhh.ScenesJoey: But what you saw, that is the extent of it, okay? One kiss.ScenesRachel: No, come on, that is a lie. We also kissed in Barbados.ScenesJoey (to Rachel): Dude, chill! (to Ross) Okay, we also kissed in Barbados, but we didn't plan it, okay? And the only reason that that happened was because I saw you kissing Charlie.ScenesRachel: Yeah, you started it! I've got to chill.ScenesJoey: Look, we probably should have talked to you about this before it ever happened, but..ScenesRachel: We feel so terrible about this, Ross.ScenesJoey: Yeah, but it did happen, so...Scenes(Ross looks shocked and says nothing.)ScenesJoey: Ross?ScenesRachel: Ross? (to Joey) Can we just close the door?ScenesOPENING CREDITS

rows.Scenes: Joey and Rachel's apartment. Continued from earlier.]
rows.Content: Rachel: Ross, say something. Anything.ScenesRoss: So you two are..?ScenesJoey and Rachel: Yeah.ScenesRoss: And have you .. ed?ScenesJoey: No, no, no!ScenesRachel: No, no, no!ScenesRoss: But if I hadn't walked in here, would you..?ScenesJoey: Probably.Scenes(Rachel looks at him.)ScenesJoey: No, no!ScenesRachel: Ross, this is not how we wanted you to find out about this. You have every right to go nuts.ScenesRoss: I'm not going nuts. Do you see me go nuts?ScenesRachel: No, but you know what I mean.ScenesRoss: Hey, hey, hey... If you two are happy, then I'm happy for you. (Squeaky.) I'm fine!ScenesJoey: Really?ScenesRoss: Absolutely. (Very Squeaky.) I'm fine! Totally fine. I don't know why it's coming out all loud and squeaky, 'cause really, (deep voice) I'm fine. I'm not saying I wasn't a little surprised to see you guys kissing. I mean, at first I was like.. (Screams.) But now that I've had time to absorb it; Lovin' this.ScenesJoey: Ross..ScenesRoss: It's all working out! Me & Charlie, and you two. You know what we should do?ScenesRachel: Calm ourselves?ScenesRoss: No. We should all have dinner. Yes, we'll do it tomorrow night. I'll cook!!ScenesJoey: Look, don't you think that will be a little weird?ScenesRoss: Weird? What? What's weird? The only thing weird would be if someone didn't like Mexican food, because I'm making fajitas!! (Storms off.)ScenesJoey: I do like fajitas.

rows.Scenes: Central Perk. Monica and Chandler are there. They have lots of brochures about adoption in front of them.]
rows.Content: Monica: God, this adoption stuff is so overwhelming. There's inter-country adoption, dependency adoption.. There are so many ways to go, and this is like the biggest decision of our lives.ScenesChandler: There's a hair in my coffee.Scenes(Phoebe enters.)ScenesPhoebe: Hey guys!ScenesMonica: Hey.ScenesPhoebe: Hey, have you seen Frank Jr., 'cause he's meeting me here with the triplets.ScenesChandler: You know, it's funny. Every time you say "triplets," I immediately think of three hot blonde 19-year olds.Scenes(Monica glares at him.)ScenesMonica: That's sweet. Drink your hair.ScenesPhoebe: Hey, what's all this stuff?ScenesMonica: Oh, they're brochures from different adoption agencies.ScenesPhoebe: Ooh, babies! Oh, this one is so cute, get this one!ScenesMonica: That's not really how it works.ScenesPhoebe: Oh, how does it work?ScenesMonica: I don't know!ScenesPhoebe: Well, if you're having a hard time, you should talk to my friends, Bill and Colleen. They adopted a kid. I'm sure they'd help you.ScenesMonica: Thanks, that would be great.
